author: Julia Page
title: With 'no end in sight' to COVID-19 lockdown in long-term care homes, 43-year-old wants out
description: Engineer and disability rights activist Jonathan Marchand, who breathes with a ventilator, said the COVID-19 crisis in Quebec's long-term care homes is showing the limits of the institutionalized patient care.
content:
From the moment he moved into the CHSLD in Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupré in 2012, Jonathan Marchand has wanted to move out. But never has it seemed more pressing than it does right now.
"I don't feel safe at all," said Marchand, 43, who requires round-the-clock hel… [+4304 chars]
